definition: Marquis (highest Han dynasty ducal title meaning lord of 10,000 households)/high nobles
marquis, second of the five orders of ancient Chinese nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/nobleman or high official

sentences.english: The General Lee, in the high and the emperor, not worth talking about 10000 hou.
sentences.chinese: 使李將軍，遇高皇帝，萬戶侯何足道哉。
